name: Unforgiven II: EFTT (DEMO) (MOBILE)
description:
THIS IS THE ANDROID VERSION!!!

The first Unforgiven was merely a minor test and is no match to the game I envision making. What you see here is a snippet testing purposes and , by  the way, your feedback on this one would really matter since I'm still very early in Developpment so if you've got any input leave in the comment section.

thank you for reading and understanding!

this contains a platforming section , a tighter one and a boss fight

memento mori my friend...

CHECK OUT THE PC VERSION FOR BETTER EXPERIENCE HERE :

https://mastermed.itch.io/unforgiven-ii-elegy-for-the-tormented-demo
